mapper.select: Select NVL(Count(*), 0) as stateCount, orderState From productOrder Where orderstate In(0, 1, 10, 11, 12, 13) And To_char(orderDate, 'YYYYmmdd') = To_char(sysdate, 'YYYYmmdd') Group by orderstate

Select NVL(Count(*), 0) as stateCount, d.orderState From delivery d Join productOrder p On d.ordernum = p.ordernum Where d.orderstate In(2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7) And To_char(orderDate, 'YYYYmmdd') = To_char(sysdate, 'YYYYmmdd') Group by d.orderstate

Select NVL(Count(*), 0) as stateCount, orderState From productOrder Where orderState In (0, 1, 10, 11, 12, 13) And To_Char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= To_Char(sysDate - 6, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And To_Char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= To_Char(sysDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') Group by orderState
